reviewText: While I have not picked up a shuttle in years, I find this DVD inspiring and educational. It was not only a refresher but instructional. I live in the country; however I feel I can start weaving again without the support of having to attend classes.

Worth the money for the method of warping he demonstrates, even for experienced weavers.  I also learned something from the demonstration on mending a broken thread and reincorporating the original warp thread.  Otherwise, more for beginners, but he is a very good teacher.
